title: Book of Dragons
description: Fans of DreamWorks Dragons will love this deluxe hardcover storybook that mimics Hiccups own Book of Dragons With a stunning sculptured cover and embossed dragons on every page This is the ultimate source of information on dragons for the ultimate dragons fan From the observations of Bork the Bold to Hiccups additions for the Dragon Academy, this book gathers all the facts, figures, and secrets that the Vikings have learned about dragons through the ages. A necessary book for every Dragons aficionado How To Train Your Dragon c 2014 DreamWorks Animation L.L.C.
author: Maggie Testa
